channel.title: Debugging message?
channel.description:
So I recently just started this project and was wondering how to have either my command prompt, on and in-game message tell me the objectID and location for whatever object I click on.
I'm not sure if I described that well. Usually it's there already but this delta that I'm using doesn't have it and it makes it a little more time consuming when I have to search for the item ID.
If anyone can help me add this little message, it would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Debugging message?
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

Okay sweet. I found it… It was noted out and it works)

Read full topic

item.title: Debugging message?
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

In your Object clicking handler, just add c.sM("Object ID: " + objectId);

Read full topic
